shef.mt.tools

Class TopicDistributionProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • shef.mt.tools.ResourceProcessor
      • shef.mt.tools.TopicDistributionProcessor

  • public class TopicDistributionProcessor
extends ResourceProcessor
    This class allows to process a file containing topic distributions. Each line of the file corresponds to a topic vector of n dimensions. Topic vectors are obtained by a pre-processing step independant from the feature extraction process.
